title: Whining Idiots = 14 day ban
body: Since when did we decide that it was okay to help people who are little, whiny, pathetic bitches? A little bit of trash talk never actually hurt anyone, just a bunch of self righteous pussies with sticks too far up their asses, whining that these people ruin their experience or hurt their feelings. When did everyone become so weak? its like the mute button doesn't exist. fuck you rito.
